feature.label: Onotoa SDK
feature.description: This feature contains the third party plugins needed to develope Onotoa. In detail these are: CTMWriter MaJorToM TMAPI TAMPIx including semagia-mio TMQL4j
feature.copyright: CTMWriter (C) Topic Maps Lab MaJorToM (C) Topic Maps Lab TMQL4j (C) Topic Maps Lab The libraries TMAPI and TAMPIx are maintained by Lars Heuer the Topic Maps community Semagia-mio
feature.license:
The license of TMAPI is unknown.
All other libraries are released under the Apache 2 license. See http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 for more onformation.
